title: Ursula Alexander: The Shield of Knowledge

story.text: Ursula Alexander, a high school teacher, discovers an ancient book in the school library that grants her the ability to shield her students from harm.
Ursula tests her new abilities by quietly stopping a falling bookshelf from injuring a student. She begins to understand the extent of her powers.
During a school fire drill, Ursula senses a real fire starting in the chemistry lab. She swiftly evacuates everyone safely, using her powers to contain the fire until firefighters arrive.
News of Ursula's heroic deeds begins to spread. She keeps her identity a secret but continues to vigilantly watch over her students and colleagues.
A troubled student confides in Ursula about a planned act of violence. Ursula intervenes, using her influence and powers to avert the crisis and help the student receive counseling.
Ursula spends her weekend learning more about the origins of her powers from the ancient book, discovering she must use them to protect and educate.
As she prepares lessons for the next week, Ursula reflects on her new role as protector, fully embracing her identity as a superhero in the academic world.

ending: And thus, Ursula Alexander unknowingly became the guardian of future generations.
moral: True heroes are those who empower and protect others, especially when no one is watching.
